entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Qu'Appelle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 1:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -26.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -30.2°C
Wind: NW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
